pages.text: $(#0BE334)Item Added In Simply More$(br2)$()A weapon consisting of an enchanted flower growing on top an unusually large stem. Found by a tribe long ago, the chieftain took no time converting this quirk of nature into a powerful tool. While usually he would have taken joy in creating another deathbringer,

he found his shamanic energy resisted his desires, wishing instead for this weapon to become a panacea rather than yet another tool of torment. Perforiscus constantly leaks a liquid remedy, growing stronger and more efficient as the flower blossoms.
